concept.title: Hive Properties and Configuration Files
concept.shortdesc: You must configure Hive Metadata to use Hive and Hadoop configuration files and individual properties.

dd.p: The following configuration files are required for the Hive Metadata processor:

dlentry.dd: You can configure individual Hive properties in the processor. To add a Hive property, specify the exact property name and the value. The processor does not validate the property names or values.Individual properties override properties defined in the configuration files. Copied & updated from Hive Streaming. Make sure changes from here go there and Hive Metadata, as needed. 6/2016.
